author: Alina Dizik
title: Why Sexual Harassment Can Be Tough to Fight at Small Firms
text:
Sexual harassment has been just as prevalent in small companies as in large ones. But some experts say that the very traits that define small firms could make it much harder to eradicate harassment there.
For starters, their smaller size and informal atmosphere—often selling points for employees—also can make some employees feel at ease with inappropriate behavior. What’s more, the companies rarely have the human-resources infrastructure that could train employees about proper behavior, or provide a channel for people to complain...
